title: MuG 3D genome browser and TADbit front-end.
name: TADkit
long_description: TADkit creates interactive 3D representations of chromatin conformations modeled from 3C-based interaction matrices. The user can overlay 1D and 2D tracks of genomic data to these 3D views to directly evaluate the relationship between the 3D structure of the genome and its biological function.

title: MuG VRE NGL Viewer
name: NGL
short_description: NGL Viewer is a web application for molecular visualization. WebGL is employed to display molecules like proteins and DNA/RNA with a variety of representations.
long_description: NGL Viewer is a web application for molecular visualization. WebGL is employed to display molecules like proteins and DNA/RNA with a variety of representations. Supports molecular structures (mmCIF, PDB, PQR, GRO, SDF, MOL2, MMTF) and density volumes (MRC/MAP/CCP4, DX/DXBIN, CUBE).

title: MuG VRE Jbrowse
name: Jbrowse
short_description: A next-generation genome browser built with JavaScript and HTML5.
long_description: JBrowse is a fast, embeddable genome browser built completely with JavaScript and HTML5. Supports GFF3, BED, FASTA, Wiggle, BigWig, BAM, VCF (with tabix), REST, and more. BAM, BigWig, and VCF data are displayed directly from chunks of the compressed binary files, no conversion needed.

title: COMING SOON
name: Cytoscape
short_description: Interactive browser for analyse and visualise networks
